text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: heh… heh… heh… heh…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey-hey, Taishin! Let's train together!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
We promised to aim for the Derby together! Then I think we should 
do the training together～.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: heh… heh… heh… heh…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey-hey～!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ah-Geez, it's annoying!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I'm saying you need to use your mind! I'm fine, so focus on your 
own race! You idiot!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Waaaaa! I was told I was an idiot～!!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: You were quite persistent so it was only a matter of time.

On that day, an “Emergency meeting” organized by Winning Ticket 
was held in order to encourage Narita Taishin who lost the race.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
It was for the sake of Taishin's power! Because I want to run 
with her in the derby!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I understand what you mean, even if you don't 
tell me. Of course, Taishin, too.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ahh～… does she really understand～… Even 
though she called me an idiot ～?

As Biwa Hayahide said, she surely understands that Winning Ticket 
wants to run the Derby together.

And it was probably hard for her to give 
encouragement to Winning Ticket.
choice_data_list: I guess she refused because she wanted to run together with you.
I guess she refused because she wanted to run together with you.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that's what it is. We promised to run together in the Derby 
but as rivals, didn't we?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Right! “Friend” and “Rival” are the same!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Then you will know that cooperation is not everything.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hmm… hmm～～～～hm… After all, I still don't understand.

Rice Shower followed the back of Mihono Bourbon 
and overtook her in the “Kikkashou”.

Instead of lining up side by side, showing your back is something 
you can do as a rival.

Instead of lining up side by side, showing your back is something 
you can do as a rival.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Showing… your back?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Both me and Taishin woke up when we saw you 
overcome the tough conditions and win.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: There is no need for words. Now let's just keep running forward.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I see… Taishin is not someone who needs my help. I want to do my 
best to run with all 3 of us!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I got it! I'm going to run a whole lot! 
Run-run, wait for Taishin to catch up!

That Nightー I heard the running footsteps 
from the training course.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: heh… heh… heh… heh…

To show your back to your rivals, encouraged by that Winning 
Ticket started doing her own self-training.

As I was watching over the situation, 2 footsteps then new 3 
footsteps got added.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: heh… heh… heh… heh…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: heh… heh… heh… heh…

I'm sure they didn't plan to meet beforehand. Coincidentally, 
these 3 girls came here at the same time with the same feelings.

3 girls who keep running silently, without exchanging 
a word. But the overlapping footsteps sounded 
like a conversation between rivals.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Geez… It's already past the training course 
closing time, what troublesome girls.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Haha, it can't be helped. Then at least, 
let me watch over them from here.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Me too, I don't want to disturb those girls.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: heh… heh… heh… heh…!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: heh… heh… heh… heh…!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ah…! heh… heh… heh… heh…!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: huh…! Haa～～!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ah!! Haaaaaa～～～～!!!!

text_block_list.name: All 3
text_block_list.text: heh… heh… heh… heh～…!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Why did you run like this? You idiot!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
It's because Taishin really started to run! 
I mean, in the first place Hayahide!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It was because I was pulled out by Taishin!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Huh? I didn't pull you! Rather, wasn't 
it Ticket who moved out first!?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: That's not true! Hmph～～…!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: …Ah… haha!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
huh, why are you turning your head? 
Don't tell me, are you laughing?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Haha… Haha!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: …he, hehe… haha!!!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: On the day of the Derby, I wonder if it will be clear like this.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Geez… All you think about is the Derby.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I've been longing for that stage all along. A stage where people 
who dream of winning the Derby gather.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Aiming for the glory, everyone's hard work, hit them with all my 
might, I'll put my everything on that 2400m.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I want to win by standing on such a stage where my heart is moved 
just by looking at it.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
For me… I also have opponents who I want to show my back to in 
addition to you guys. I have to get stronger for her.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Me winning the Derby is proof of the strength to be the 
strongest. I will surely win.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
… As for more, before I entered school, I was told by people 
around me that I lacked ability.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I was not able to produce results, that's why it is not strange 
to be seen like that, but it would be frustrating if you admitted 
that. You would get sick of yourself.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
That's why, I want to get back at them. Winning the Derby, will 
be my proof that I'm not lacking in ability.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Let's run together! I want to win the Derby with all 3 of us!
